description: The creation of the team is key to driving Isle of Man drug crime down, the chief constable says.
title: Isle of Man border force 'critical' in tackling drug crime, says chief constable
title_page: Isle of Man border force 'critical' in tackling drug crime, says chief constable - BBC News
maintext: "Having an effective agency that provides a visible presence, but is able to analyse travel data and share intelligence across the island with law enforcement agencies, but even more importantly with law enforcement agencies in the UK, is critical," he said.
